title: SwiftUI Masterclass: Advanced Animations
description: Dive deep into SwiftUI animations and transitions. Learn how to create smooth, performant animations that delight users. We'll cover timing curves, spring animations, matched geometry effects, and custom transition types.

title: Server-Side Swift with Vapor
description: Build robust backend services using Swift and the Vapor framework. Learn about routing, middleware, database integration, and API design patterns that scale.

title: Welcome Breakfast
description: Start your day with a delicious breakfast and meet fellow Swift developers. Continental breakfast with local Texel specialties.

title: Async/Await Deep Dive
description: Master Swift's concurrency model. Learn about async/await, actors, task groups, and how to write safe concurrent code that performs well.

title: Beach Cycling Tour
description: Explore the beautiful Texel coastline on bikes. Guided tour of local beaches, dunes, and wildlife areas. Weather permitting.

title: Testing Strategies for iOS Apps
description: Comprehensive guide to testing iOS applications. Unit tests, UI tests, snapshot testing, and test-driven development practices.

title: Conference Dinner
description: Join us for a special conference dinner featuring local Texel cuisine. Network with speakers and fellow attendees in a relaxed setting.

title: Check-in & Registration
description: Arrive at the venue, check into your accommodation, and collect your conference materials. Welcome desk open all day.

title: Shuttle to Schiphol Airport
description: Comfortable coach transportation back to Schiphol Airport. Please check departure times in advance.

title: Mentor Dinner Discussion
description: Exclusive dinner session for invited participants to discuss advanced Swift topics with our mentors in an intimate setting.
